document.full_text: an african union plan to halt libya's civil war collapsed, and rebels said the increasingly bloody siege of the city of misrata by muammar gaddafi's troops made talk of a ceasefire meaningless.
document.title: libyan fighting goes on after peace bid fails
lines_and_colors: an african union plan to halt libya's civil war collapsed, and rebels said the increasingly bloody siege of the city of misrata by muammar gaddafi's troops made talk of a ceasefire meaningless.
